input-section.title: Patient Measurements
input-section.description: Enter the anatomical measurements in the fields below to obtain the appropriate EVAR prosthesis.
input-section.annotation: The entered values will automatically appear in the reference image.

form.contralateralDistance: Distance from neck to contralateral distal sealing (mm)
form.ipsilateralDistance: Distance from neck to ipsilateral distal sealing (mm)

input-section.information: The values entered in the fields will automatically appear in the reference image.

results-section.title: Results and Recommendations
results-section.results-intro: Enter the patient’s measurements and click "Calculate Prosthesis" to obtain the recommendations.

error.generic: Please complete all fields with valid numeric values.
error.no-main-body:
No main body available for a neck diameter of {neckDiameter}mm with oversizing between 10% and 30%.
Consider surgical alternatives or devices with a different diameter.
error.no-branches: No branches available for diameter {iliacDiameter}mm with oversizing between 10% and 30%.

branch.title: ↔️ Iliac Branch {side} ({branchLabel} leg)
branch.bridge-warning:
⚠️ Warning: Additional bridging branch required to cover the full distance on the {side} side.
Estimated remaining distance: ~{remainingDistance}mm

warnings.oversizing-high: High oversizing of the main body (+{oversizing}%). Verify anatomical compatibility.
warnings.oversizing-low: Very low oversizing of the main body (+{oversizing}%). High risk of type I endoleak.

footer.warning: WARNING: This application is for informational purposes only and does not replace professional clinical judgment.
footer.legal: It has not been validated for use in patients. For more information, see "Legal Notice and Terms of Use"
footer.concept-by: Original concept by Dr. Esteve Bramon Casademont
footer.created-by:
Created by Esteve Bramon Casademont, Mariona Mas Padilla, Sergio Domínguez Moreno, and Andrea Maxé.
Barcelona, 2025.

legal.title: Legal Notice and Terms of Use
legal.section1-content: This application is intended exclusively for informational and educational purposes. It does not constitute a diagnostic tool nor does it replace the clinical judgment of healthcare professionals. The user assumes full responsibility for its use.
legal.section2-content: The developers do not guarantee the accuracy or clinical validity of the recommendations or results provided. This tool is not certified as a medical device. Any medical decision must be based on professional evaluation and not on the results provided by this application. Its use is the sole responsibility of the user.
legal.section3-content: The application may collect personal or medical data solely for its internal operation. This data will not be used for commercial purposes nor shared with third parties, and will be processed in accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and Spanish Law 3/2018 (LOPDGDD). The user may exercise their rights of access, rectification, or deletion of data at any time.
legal.section4-content: All content, design, source code, and graphic elements of this application are the property of the developers and are protected by intellectual property laws. Reproduction, distribution, or modification without express authorization is prohibited.
legal.section5-content: These terms are governed by Spanish law. For any dispute arising from the use of the application, the parties will submit to the competent courts of the owner's domicile.
